Citation_Information.description: The PDS3 Clementine EDR data set includes several hundred Excel 95 worksheets (tllun*.xls) describing important events during each orbit / revolution. These appear to have been partially but not completely translated into the EKs in the PDS3 data set CLEM1-L-SPICE-6-V1.0. As these were working mission documents, the entirety of their contents are of at least historical interest. Because of the way they use visual functions of Excel to make semantic distinctions, we were unable to find a straightforward way to convert them into a simple tabular format. We therefore simply converted them to PDF/A and bundled them into a ~ 1000-page booklet.

Modification_Detail.description: Collected files from PDS3 archive and bundled into PDF/A.

As these were working mission documents, the entirety of their contents are of at least historical interest. Because of the way they use visual functions of Excel to make semantic distinctions, we were unable to find a straightforward way to convert them into a simple tabular format.
